title: Enhancing Hospitality Practice Competencies: Retinal Aging Change Research: Practitioner-Centered Practical Training

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary anatomy and biology knowledge, along with basic medical imaging interpretation skills
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze retinal OCT images to explain age-related structural changes in the retina.
Learners can understand the fundamental principles of Counterfactual GANs and apply methods for generating virtual scenarios using them.
Learners can measure and interpret thickness changes in key retinal layers (RNFL, GCIPL, INL-RPE, RPE) by age and gender.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
